select.columns:
ctax_move_head.taxh_seqno, cempresa.cifemp ruc_emp, cempresa.empname nombre_emp, ctax_move_head.taxh_ejefis || LPAD(ctax_move_head.taxh_perfis, 2, '0') || '00' periodo, '' car_sunat, TO_CHAR(ctax_move_head.taxh_fecdoc, '%d/%m/%Y') fecha_emision, TO_CHAR(tmp_cefectos.fecven, '%d/%m/%Y') fecha_vencimiento, ctax_move_head.taxh_tipdoc tipo_documento, SUBSTR(ctax_move_head.taxh_docser, 0, CHARINDEX('-', ctax_move_head.taxh_docser)-1) serie_documento, CASE WHEN ctax_move_head.taxh_tipdoc IN ('50' , '51', '52', '53', '54') THEN YEAR(gcomfach.fecope) END a√±o_emision, LPAD(SUBSTR(ctax_move_head.taxh_docser, CHARINDEX('-', ctax_move_head.taxh_docser)+1), 8, '0') num_documento, '' nro_final, ctax_move_head.taxh_ciftyp tipo_doc_tercer, ctax_move_head.taxh_cifter nro_doc_tercer, ctax_move_head.taxh_nombre nom_tercer,
CASE WHEN ctax_move_line.taxl_code IN ('IGVG', 'IGVH') THEN (NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basnimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuoded, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuonded, 0)) ELSE 0 END bi_gravado_dg, CASE WHEN ctax_move_line.taxl_code IN ('IGVG', 'IGVH') THEN (NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basnimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuoded, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuonded, 0)) ELSE 0 END igv_dg,
CASE WHEN ctax_move_line.taxl_code IN ('IGVE', 'IGVI') THEN (NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basnimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuoded, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuonded, 0)) ELSE 0 END bi_gravado_dgng, CASE WHEN ctax_move_line.taxl_code IN ('IGVE', 'IGVI') THEN (NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basnimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuoded, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuonded, 0)) ELSE 0 END igv_dgng,
CASE WHEN ctax_move_line.taxl_code IN ('R4C', 'R4C0') THEN (NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basnimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuoded, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuonded, 0)) ELSE 0 END bi_gravado_dng, CASE WHEN ctax_move_line.taxl_code IN ('R4C', 'R4C0') THEN (NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basnimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuoded, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuonded, 0)) ELSE 0 END igv_dng,
CASE WHEN ctax_move_line.taxl_type IN ('N', 'R') THEN (NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_basnimp, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuoded, 0) + NVL(ctax_move_line.taxl_cuonded, 0)) ELSE 0 END valor_adq_ng, '0.00' isc, '0.00' icbper, '0.00' otros_trib_cargos,
ctax_move_head.taxh_import imp_total_adq, ctax_move_head.taxh_moneda moneda, ctax_move_head.taxh_cambio tipo_cambio,
ctax_move_head.taxh_fecrec fec_emision_rect, ctax_move_recti.taxh_tipdoc tip_doc_rect, SUBSTR(ctax_move_head.taxh_docrec, 0, CHARINDEX('-', ctax_move_head.taxh_docrec)-1) serie_doc_rect, '' cod_dependencia, LPAD(SUBSTR(ctax_move_head.taxh_docrec, CHARINDEX('-', ctax_move_head.taxh_docrec)+1), 8, '0') num_doc_rect,
'0' clasif_bienes_serv, '' id_contrato, '' porcen_contrato, '' imb, '' car_rect, campo38
select.where:
ctax_move_head.taxh_natfac = 'C' AND ctax_move_line.taxl_code IN ('IGVG', 'IGVE', 'IGVX', 'IGVI', 'IGVH', 'IGVS', 'R4C', 'R4C0') AND ctax_move_line.taxl_type IN ('N', 'R')
AND ctax_move_head.taxh_tipdoc NOT IN ('91', '97', '98') AND ctax_move_head.taxh_ejefis = 2024 AND ctax_move_head.taxh_perfis = 1
AND ctax_move_head.taxh_tipdoc = '01'

ctax_move_head.taxh_natfac = 'C' AND ctax_move_line.taxl_code IN ('IGVG', 'IGVE', 'IGVX', 'IGVI', 'IGVH', 'IGVS', 'R4C', 'R4C0') AND ctax_move_line.taxl_type IN ('N', 'R') AND ctax_move_head.taxh_tipdoc NOT IN ('91', '97', '98') AND ctax_move_head.taxh_ejefis = 2024 AND ctax_move_head.taxh_perfis = 1
AND ctax_move_head.taxh_tipdoc = '01'
